Root.Tooltip:
Fast scout. Has a flame attack that damages all enemy units in its line of fire. Can transform into a close range combat unit.

Can attack ground units.
Root.Name: Build Hellion

Root.Tooltip: Heavy tank. Can switch into Siege Mode to provide long-range artillery support.**Can attack ground units**
Root.Name: Build Siege Tank

Root.Tooltip:
Heavy assault mech.

Can attack ground and air units.
Root.Name: Build Thor

Root.Tooltip: Sends constructed units to the designated point. Workers rallied to resources will begin gathering automatically.
Root.Name: Set Rally Point

Root.Tooltip: Transforms structure into a slow air unit for redeployment. May not produce units, research upgrades, or use abilities until it has landed.
Root.Name: Lift Off

Root.Tooltip: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Root.Name: Halt

Root.Tooltip: Allows 2 units to be created simultaneously.
Root.Name: Build Reactor

Root.Tooltip:
Vehicle-research structure. A Tech Lab can fit onto any production structure.

Enables:
- Siege Tanks
- Thor with Armory
- Cyclones
Root.Name: Build Tech Lab

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Cancels construction of this structure, destroying the structure and giving a partial refund.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Selects the unit constructing this structure.
Root.Name: Select Builder

Root.Tooltip:
Anti-vehicle mech. Haywire missiles do bonus damage to mechanical units.

Can attack ground units.
Root.Name: Build Warhound

Root.Tooltip:
Mobile assault vehicle. Can use Lock On to quickly fire while moving.

Can attack ground and air units.
Root.Name: Build Cyclone

Root.Tooltip:
Close range combat unit. Deals damage in a small frontal cone. Can transform into a fast scout unit.

Can attack ground units.
Root.Name: Build Hellbat

Root.Tooltip:
Robotic mine. Launches missiles at nearby enemy units while burrowed. Attacks deal splash damage in a small area around the target.

Can attack ground and air units.
Root.Name: Build Widow Mine

Root.Tooltip:
Fast skirmish unit. Can use the Spider Mine ability.

Can attack ground units.
Root.Name: Build Vulture

Root.Tooltip: Enables additional unit construction options and allows 2 units to be created simultaneously.
Root.Name: Build Tech Reactor

Root.Tooltip: Enables additional unit construction options and allows 2 units to be created simultaneously.
Root.Name: Build Tech Reactor

Root.Tooltip:
Fast, high-damage hovertank. Rail Gun can fire while the Diamondback is moving.

Can attack ground units.
Root.Name: Build Diamondback

Root.Tooltip:
Heavy-fire support unit.

Can attack ground and air units.
Root.Name: Build Goliath

Root.Tooltip: Deploys 2 Heavy Siege Tanks.Enhanced heavy tank. Can switch into Siege Mode to provide long-range artillery support. Can be upgraded to use Spider Mines.**Can attack ground units**
Root.Name: Deploy Heavy Siege Tanks

Root.Tooltip: This unit unlocks at Commander Level 6.
Root.Name: Build Thor

Root.Tooltip: Armored weapons platform. Can be outfitted with various specialized weapons.
Root.Name: Warbot

Root.Tooltip: Factory allows you to build Perdition Turrets.
Root.Name: Perdition Turret

Root.Tooltip: Mastery: Units deployed from this structure gain 0.0% attack speed.
Root.Name: Combat Mastery

Root.Tooltip:
Raynor trains combat units and builds Barracks 50% faster.
Mechanical units cost 20% less gas.
Stimpack grants increased bonuses, costs less life, and does not require research.
Root.Name: Army Rapid Recruitment

Root.Tooltip: Mastery: Units deployed from this structure regenerate 0.0 life per second while out of combat.
Root.Name: Endurance Training

Root.Tooltip:
Raynor trains combat units and builds Barracks 50% faster.
Mechanical units cost 20% less gas.
Stimpack grants increased bonuses, costs less life, and does not require research.
Root.Name: Vespene Efficiency Assembling

Root.Tooltip: Barracks, Factory, and Starport units are delivered directly to the structure’s Rally Point.
Root.Name: Orbital Drop-Pods

Root.Tooltip: Factory allows you to build Devastation Turrets.
Root.Name: Devastation Turret

Behaviors.Tooltip: This structure's fire is being extinguished and is repairing itself to 50% of its maximum life.
